us.pserver.remote

Interface Server

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServer, NetworkServer

    public interface Server
extends java.lang.Runnable
    Interface que define a estrutura principal do servidor de objetos.
    Version:
    1.0 - 21/01/2014
    Author:
    Juno Roesler - juno.rr@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_AVAILABLE_THREADS
      Quantidade total de Threads disponíveis para no pool que atende as demandas
      DEFAULT_AVAILABLE_THREADS = 6.
